articles.author: Christina A. Cassidy
articles.title: How the House's requirement to prove US citizenship could affect the ability to register to vote - AP News
articles.description: Voting rights groups warn legislation passed by the House requiring documentary proof of U.S. citizenship for anyone registering to vote could disenfranchise millions of Americans. If the Safeguard American Voter Eligibility Act becomes law, it would apply to…
articles.content: ATLANTA (AP) The U.S. House on Thursday approved legislation requiring documentary proof of U.S. citizenship for anyone registering to vote, something voting rights group have warned could disenfranc… [+8528 chars]
